title: Excalibur

properties.value: Excalibur is a one-handed sword and a quest item obtained from the Merlin's Crystal quest and used in the Holy Grail quest. It requires 20 Attack to wield and has similar stats to the adamant longsword, except for 6 less strength bonus and 1 more magic defence.

Excalibur

Item ID35

Excalibur is a one-handed sword and a quest item obtained from the Merlin's Crystal quest and used in the Holy Grail quest. It requires 20 Attack to wield and has similar stats to the adamant longsword, except for 6 less strength bonus and 1 more magic defence.

In the Merlin's Crystal quest, the player must use Excalibur on the crystal to smash and free Merlin. It is obtained from Lady of the Lake after she tests the purity of the players spirit when giving a beggar bread at Grum's Gold Exchange in Port Sarim.

In the Holy Grail quest, Excalibur must be used to deal the final damage on the Black Knight Titan in order to enter the Fisher Realm and be able to continue the quest. Other weapons may be used to deal damage, as long as Excalibur is what kills him, if not the fight will restart.

Low level players may find Excalibur useful for combat because of its stats, low requirements to obtain and wield, and is free the first time.

If lost, it can be retrieved from the Lady of the Lake in Taverley for 500 coins.

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player performing the Excalibur's special attack, Sanctuary.

Excalibur has a special attack, Sanctuary, which temporarily increases the player's Defence by 8 and consumes 100% special attack energy.

[[File:Excalibur detail.png|left|130x200px]]
'''Excalibur''' is a one-handed [[sword]] and a [[quest item]] obtained from the [[Merlin's Crystal]] [[quest]] and used in the [[Holy Grail]] quest. It requires 20 [[Attack]] to wield and has similar [[stats]] to the [[adamant longsword]], except for 6 less [[strength bonus]] and 1 more magic defence. 

In the Merlin's Crystal quest, the player must use Excalibur on the crystal to smash and free [[Merlin]]. It is obtained from [[Lady of the Lake]] after she tests the purity of the players spirit when giving a [[beggar]] [[bread]] at [[Grum's Gold Exchange]] in [[Port Sarim]].

In the Holy Grail quest, Excalibur '''must''' be used to deal the final [[damage]] on the [[Black Knight Titan]] in order to enter the [[Fisher Realm]] and be able to continue the quest. Other weapons may be used to deal damage, as long as Excalibur is what kills him, if not the fight will restart.

Low level players may find Excalibur useful for combat because of its stats, low requirements to obtain and wield, and is free the first time.

If lost, it can be retrieved from the [[Lady of the Lake]] in [[Taverley]] for {{NoCoins|500}} coins.
